short_description: ergo styli is a cosmetics store based in santa clarita, california, united states.
long_description: ergo styling tools exists to create hair styling tools that are easier to use, ergonomically friendly to the body and deliver longer lasting shiny hair. for nearly 30 years, leading hairstylists and salons have chosen ergo styling tools for professional use and offer them to their clients to help keep their hair beautiful at home. today, we are equally a maker of great hair styling tools and offer education to stylists, such as the "art of the blow dry". our products are regarded as the industry leader in delivering perfectly ergonomic hair styling tools that meet the quality standards and after sales service needs of our demanding clientele founder - robert reed. the best ideas for hair styling tools come from hair stylists. at ergo, we don't copy anyone or anything. we have traveled into thousands of hair salons to observe hair stylists while they work. this has allowed us to ask questions such as "what would make that tool work better and faster for you?" and "what new looks are you creating, so we can develop new styling tools for you?".
generated_description: ergo styling tools, based in santa clarita, california, is a company specializing in the design and production of professional hairstyling tools. originally established as ergo research inc., the company focuses on creating ergonomic hair styling tools that enhance the comfort and performance of hairstylists. ergo styling tools are widely used by salons and hair care companies, providing tools that are designed to be both efficient and aesthetically pleasing. the company is known for its commitment to quality, using high-quality materials and offering exceptional customer support.
